description: Aspect Model to transport structured master data – including product, material and 3D related data

Text.description: Describes a Property which contains plain text. This is intended exclusively for human readable strings, not for identifiers, measurement values, etc.

UuidV4Trait.description: The provided regular expression ensures that the UUID is composed of five groups of characters separated by hyphens, in the form 8-4-4-4-12 for a total of 36 characters (32 hexadecimal characters and 4 hyphens), optionally prefixed by "urn:uuid:" to make it an IRI.

versionId.description: The identifier of this exact version of the requirement represented by a UUID, valid for the Catena-X dataspace.

Timestamp.description: Describes a Property which contains the date and time with an optional timezone.

KeyTrait.description: Ensure that the key only contains letters, digits, underscores, and hyphens

MetadataEntity.description: Entity for key and value of requirement metadata.

key.description: The key may contain only letters, digits, underscores, and hyphens.

value.description: Value string for the associated metadata

MetadataList.description: List of additional metadata that is associated with the requirement and not standardized in the aspect model.

SpecificationList.description: A list of all related specifications (e.g. norms)

VersionPredecessorCharacteristic.description: Describes the version of the predecessor of the requirement.

versionPredecessorId.description: The identifier of the predecessor version of the requirement represented by a UUID, valid for the Catena-X dataspace.

RequirementInformationCharacteristic.description: Mainnode for all the Requirement related information

version.description: Version of the requirement with it's predecessor

foreignId.description: Identifier from an external system (e.g. the chapter in a set of requirements)

metadata.description: Additional metadata that is associated with the requirement and not standardized in the aspect model.

versionPredecessor.description: Includes the informaiton to identifiy predecessor requirement (e.g., ID and Version).

SoftwareDataCharacteristic.description: Characteristic representing/collecting all the Software Data of the Digital Master Data Model

securityAndEncryptionStandards.description: Defines cybersecurity measures implemented in the software

signatureSign.description: Flashware must be signed according to securtiy class CCC

softwareVersion.description: Defines the version number of the embedded software or firmware

DensityCharacteristic.description: Density of the material for CAD model usage 7850 kg/m³

MaterialIDCharacteristic.description: Identification of the material from defined material database or standard

ThermalExpansionCoefficientCharacteristi.description: Rate of material expansion per degree of temperature change; 2.3 × 10⁻⁶ 1/K

density.description: Density of the material for CAD model usage 7850 kg/m³

materialDescription.description: Specifies the primary material composition of the part

materialID.description: Identification of the material from defined material database or standard

thermalExpansionCoefficient.description: Rate of material expansion per degree of temperature change; 2.3 × 10⁻⁶ 1/K

Reference3DCADDrawingCharacteristic.description: Link  the digital CAD model used for design and manufacturing (external and Catena-X-internal ressources, URN's). Based on IDTA SMT 020026  - Provision of 3D Models

BoundingBoxLenght.description: The minimal 3D box that fully encloses the part geometry (length x width x height),  units in millimetre.

BoundingBoxWidth.description: The minimal 3D box that fully encloses the part geometry (length x width x height),  units in millimetre.

BoundingBoxHeight.description: The minimal 3D box that fully encloses the part geometry (length x width x height),  units in millimetre.

BoundingBoxCharacteristic.description: The minimal 3D box that fully encloses the part geometry (length x width x height), units in millimetre.

boundingBoxPropertyWidth.description: The minimal 3D box that fully encloses the part geometry (length x width x height),,  units in millimetre.

boundingBoxPropertyHeight.description: The minimal 3D box that fully encloses the part geometry (length x width x height),  units in millimetre.

BoundingSphereCharacteristic.description: Diameter of the smallest possible sphere that fully encloses the part geometry. { "value": 315.0, "unit": "mm" }

CalculatedWeightCharacteristic.description: Mass of the part, typically in kilograms. Calculated out of all belonging 3D-models

WeightToleranceTrait.description: Tolerance range of the weight of a part or assembly. ±0.5 kg or ±2%

CenterOfGravityCharacteristic.description: The calculated center of mass in a coordinate system for proper weight distribution

EstimatedWeightCharacteristic.description: Estimated mass of the part, typically in kilograms. Based on early design assumptions or incomplete data.

releaseDate.description: The official date when the part was approved.

partNumber.description: Unique identifier assigned to the part by the OEM or supplier (Sachnummer)

notes.description: List of notes that can be attached as additional information in engineering process.

nomenclature.description: Standardized name of the part based on its function or application

description.description: Detailed textual description of the part, including key Detailed textual description of the part, including key characteristics

homologationApprovalNumber.description: Official certification number confirming compliance with regulatory requirements

safetyRelevant.description: Describes, if safety relevance is required

safetyRelevantFeatures.description:
Number of safety relevant properties according to partner

Daimler: DS und DZ Merkmale (Dokumentationspflichtig Sicherheitsrelevant und Dokumentationspflichtig Zertifizierungsrelevant)
VW: D und S Merkmale (Dokumentationspflichtig und Sicherheitsrelevant)
BMW: L und S und F Merkmale (Legal: Zulassungs- oder homologationsrelevant, Sicherheitsrelevant, Funktions- oder fertigungsrelevant)
GM / Opel: S/C und F/F Merkmale (Safety and Compliance / Fit and Function)
Ford: CC und SC Merkmale (Critical Characteristic / Significant Characteristic)
Fiat / Alfa Romeo / Renault / PSA: R und S Merkmale (Réglementation und Security)
Conti: D und W Merkmale (Dokumentationspflichtige und Wichtige Merkmale)

statutoryFeatures.description: Specifies the legal and industry standards the part complies with

engineering.description: Top node of the Engineering cluster

basicdata.description: Property representing/collecting all the Basic Data of the Digital Master Data Mdoel

digitalMasterDataID.description: The identifier of a requirement represented by a UUID, valid for the Catena-X dataspace.

complianceData.description: Property representing/collecting all the Compliance Data of the Digital Master Data Model
